=Summary=
Thomas Edward Hyland is an English musician, song-writer and performer most widely known as the lead-guitarist in [[The Electric Swing Circus|Electric Swing Circus]].  

==Early life==
===Family===
Hyland was born in [[Devon]], [[United Kingdom]], in 1984, to parents Michael Hyland and Sandra Hyland.  

Hyland's family moved to [[Denbury]], In Devon, during his childhood. He has an elder sister Katie and young sister and brother Alice and Edward.
